name: Car Driving Traffic Challenges
description:
This game offers ultimate and fun car racing experience with real car driving. Drive the car on the highway in the extreme and enhanced game play and racing surroundings. Test your driving skills in the adventurous simulation game to take your car driving experience to the next level. Car Driving Traffic challenge is the fast paced racing game, and you need have to be extra careful and super-efficient to keep with the real traffic to avoid an accident on the highway. This 3d- car racing game is all about the precision and will test your driving resolve on the highway in heavy traffic driving conditions and enhance your car racing experience like never before.

Drive your car on the exciting racing tracks and avoids collision with other traffic using your driving skills, and driver needs to improvise to complete the given tasks. You will have full freedom to drive your car throughout the city, but under the strict driving rules. On the completion of the task you will be rewarded with cash, which you can use to customize your ride and buy new cars.

How to Play:

• Start your car by using Start button.
• Control your car by using break and acceleration buttons.
• Tilt your phone left and right to control driving direction.
• Touch the button on the right of your screen to boost the car
• Touch brake button (left side of screen) to slow down the car
• Boost your car for cover maximum distance to beat your friends.
• Buy better car to have better handling.
• Rate and share this addictive game with your friends

Features:

• Real time traffic
• Pleasant sound effects.
• Endless city roads with traffic cars
• Realistic environment experience
• Various coolest sport cars to choose
• Rotating camera angle
• Unique and high speed car collection.
